TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_pwn_Kiring, title = Kiring, year = 2024, month = December, day = 7, note = {In Wikipedia [Paiwan]}, url = {https://pwn.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kiring} }

S.FORM: == Kiring == u sulit nu Hulam: 給陵部落 u siwkay nu niyazu' i Taitung a kuwan nu Kalinku ku niyazu' nu Kiring. u kasalumaluma' nu Kiring sa, 18 ku luma'. kumud nu kasabinawlan sa, 38 ku tademawan. kasabinawlan nu Ingcumin sa, 37 ku tademaw, pakalatu 97%. u zuma sa, cay ku Ingcumin, 1 ku tademaw, pakalatu 3%. u asip nu tademaw u kasabinacadan, Paywan(Paiwan) 89%, zumazuma 8%. u Paywan (Paiwan) a niyazu' u Paywan a niyazu' kuyni, katuud ku Paywan a tademaw itini mueneng. u Sakizaya a tademaw i Taitung a kuwan, caay katuud ku Sakizaya. inayi' ku Sakizaya a tademaw itini mueneng. izaw tu hakya, caayhenay pasumad tu ngangan nu cidekay. u cidekay nu Taywan Yincumin u niyazu' sa, u luyaluy nu tademaw, pulung muengeneng, u kabana' kami, hina u lalumaay amin i niyazu', caay kayadah ku ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamu, atu kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tumuk) saca babalaki mililid tu niyazu'. i Taywan Yincumin, izaw ku 16 cidekay puluung sa 748 a niyazu', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ku Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ku Laaluwa. u tabakiaya a niyazu' sa, ku Tapalong, u niyazu' nu Pangcah(Amis). tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2018 a mihcan 4 a bulad pulung sausi (561,327), Pangcah (209,430), Tayan (90,059), Paywan (100,689), Yuwatan (58,390), Rukay (13,314), Puyuma (14,140), Cou (6,635), Saysiat (6,607), Yami (4,606), Saw (785), Kabalan (1,465), Taluku (31,501), Sakizaya (929), Sejek (9,992), Laaluwa (399), Kanakanabu (334), zuma (12,052) tademaw nu Yincumin, pulung sausi katukuh 2017 a mihca 10 a bulad

== Kiring == o solit no Holam: 給陵部落 o siwkay no niyazo' i Taitong a kowan no Kalinko ko niyazo' no Kiring. o kasalomaloma' no Kiring sa, 18 ko loma'. komod no kasabinawlan sa, 38 ko tademawan. kasabinawlan no Ingcomin sa, 37 ko tademaw, pakalato 97%. o zoma sa, cay ko Ingcomin, 1 ko tademaw, pakalato 3%. o asip no tademaw o kasabinacadan, Paywan(Paiwan) 89%, zomazoma 8%. o Paywan (Paiwan) a niyazo' o Paywan a niyazo' koyni, katood ko Paywan a tademaw itini moeneng. o Sakizaya a tademaw i Taitong a kowan, caay katood ko Sakizaya. inayi' ko Sakizaya a tademaw itini moeneng. izaw to hakya, caayhenay pasomad to ngangan no cidekay. o cidekay no Taywan Yincomin o niyazo' sa, o loyaloy no tademaw, polong moengeneng, o kabana' kami, hina o lalomaay amin i niyazo', caay kayadah ko ihekalay a tademaw. silecaday a lalangawan, lisin, kamo, ato kabanaan. si kalilidan(Tomok) saca babalaki mililid to niyazo'. i Taywan Yincomin, izaw ko 16 cidekay poloong sa 748 a niyazo', maka 55 a mang a tademaw. satabakiaya a cidekay ko Pangcah(Amis), saadidi'ay a cidekay ko Laalowa. o tabakiaya a niyazo' sa, ko Tapalong, o niyazo' no Pangcah(Amis). tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2018 a mihcan 4 a bolad polong saosi (561,327), Pangcah (209,430), Tayan (90,059), Paywan (100,689), Yowatan (58,390), Rokay (13,314), Poyoma (14,140), Coo (6,635), Saysiat (6,607), Yami (4,606), Saw (785), Kabalan (1,465), Taloko (31,501), Sakizaya (929), Sejek (9,992), Laalowa (399), Kanakanabo (334), zoma (12,052) tademaw no Yincomin, polong saosi katokoh 2017 a mihca 10 a bolad
